name: Prescription Julep
description: This recipe from the 19th century predates the era of the ubiquitous bourbon mint julep, instead using cognac and rye, making for a delicious throwback.
keywords: cognac, mint leaves, rye whiskey, spring
recipeIngredient: 7 mint leaves plus one mint sprig

recipeInstructions.text: In an old-fashioned glass or julep cup, dissolve sugar in water. Add mint leaves and press lightly with a spoon. Add spirits, fill glass with finely crushed ice and stir. Poke a straw and mint sprig into julep and serve.
